impact-statement: Building on previous work (Ly et al., 2014), we show that elutriated cells and arrested cells have similar patterns of DNA content and cyclin expression: however, a large fraction of the proteome changes detected in arrested cells are found to reflect arrest-specific responses rather than physiological cell cycle regulation.
